amendment.description: To strike the provision relating to instructions to the Committee on Agriculture.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1726 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 173.

action.text: Amendment SA 1726 proposed by Senator Lujan to Amendment SA 1717. To strike the provision relating to instructions to the Committee on Agriculture.
